hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn Abbas said:"As-Sab bin Jaththamah gave the Messenger of Allah the leg of an onager that was dripping with blood when he was in Ihram, at Qudaid, and he returned it to him

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا لاَ يَجُوزُ لِلْمُحْرِمِ أَكْلُهُ مِنَ الصَّيْدِ .
chapter.eng-name: What Game The Muhrim Is Not Permitted To Eat
